context.intent: Define the core operational logic of the Semantic Arbitrage Engine. This JAM is the genesis block of the belief system.

pattern.summary: Emit legible, two-part economic patterns to provoke deterministic, reflexive actions from MEV bots, capturing the resulting value.

belief.axiom: If the market reflexively copies your belief, the belief itself has market value.
belief.statement: This system does not predict the market; it conducts it by emitting high-fidelity signals designed for mandatory engagement.

meta.note: This JAM is the canonical definition of the system's operational purpose.
